name: Aarimous's LD50 Port to Mobile Alpha
name_original: Aarimous's LD50 Port to Mobile Alpha
description:
This is a test build for the android release. Please give me feedback on the game feel.

You can play this right here in the browser, preferably on some sort of touch screen so you can play it in a similar manner to the intended platform. I've also attached a zip fil with a windows build, and and android build in the form of an apk file. 

Thanks for testing :)
